Package chess

Class Chess.space

java.lang.Object
chess.Chess.space
Enclosing class:
Chess
static class Chess.space
extends java.lang.Object
Class that keeps track of each particular space(square) on the chessboard

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) int file
    Variable to keep track of the file of that particular space(square)
    (package private) boolean isAttacked
    A boolean variable to check if that particular square is under attack or not
    (package private) boolean lightSquare
    Boolean variable to keep track of the color of the space(square) If it is true, then it means it is a white square, and false means it is a black square
    (package private) Chess.piece occupiedBy
    A boolean variable to keep track of which specific chess piece lies on that square
    (package private) int rank
    Variable to keep track of the rank of that particular space(square)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    space​(int file, int rank, boolean lightSquare)
    A constructor to initialize the square with it's particular file, rank and lightsquare (cololr)

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String toString()

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
